title: HOUR 3 - Sean Payton, Matt LaFleur, Dallas Cowboys
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Sean Payton, Matt LaFleur, Dallas Cowboys
description:
In hour 3, Colin discusses if Dallas will be the same team when Dak returns to the line-up. They've found success leaning into and old formula that worked, the RUN GAME! He criticizes Packers head coach Matt LaFleur for their loss to the Giants and why he's been anointed as a "great" coach too soon and Sean Payton joins to talk pre-game preparation and schemes, LA Rams and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
